Concurrent reloadings of resources was the cause. Putting resource reloading routine in synchronization fixed this.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 152489 ***

switch from reource to authoring

It seems that this bug is partially fixed.  The package is created fine but I still see some exceptions when doing the following steps,

1. add a content package in a plugin
2. check that it is added in the config editor 
3. switch to resources perspective
4. checking config.xmi/plugin.xmi
5. do Team-->Refresh Status on both files
6. switch back to authoring and click on the config

in the last comments,

step4 should read:  

checkin config.xmi/plugin.xmi
Cached method elements in LibraryService was not updated after reload + Event timing issue in ConfigurationPage
